= ChangeLog

== 0.3.3

* Update to lz4 latest version (r119) #9

== 0.3.2

* Fix a bug #7

== 0.3.1

* Support raw data handling methods in JRuby

== 0.3.0

* Support raw data handling methods (but not worked in JRuby). 
  * LZ4.Raw.compress()
  * LZ4.Raw.compressHC()
  * LZ4.Raw.decompress()
* Rename LZ4.uncompress() to LZ4.decompress().
